title: Best of Morocco
inclusions_evidence: Packed with value: 15-day small group trip from Casablanca to Marrakech with Intrepid
14-nights accommodation Campsite (1 night), Gite homestay (1 night), Guesthouse (1 nights), Hotel (11 nights)
Transport: Private Bus, Public bus, Taxi, High Speed Train

items.label: Transport (Private Bus, Public bus, Taxi, High Speed Train)

other.notes: DIY costs for meals and transport are variable and depend on personal choices.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour with accommodations and meals included, which can be difficult to replicate at a similar price. However, without specific DIY pricing, it's hard to quantify savings.
